price: (20) [Moses] said, "I did it, then, while I was of those astray [i.e., ignorant].
arabic: قَالَ فَعَلۡتُهَآ إِذٗا وَأَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qāla faʿaltuhā idhan wa-anā mina al-ḍālīna
